DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether significant predictable change bioavailability extended-release venlafaxine occur follow Roux-en-Y gastric bypass .
DOC.brief_title: Study Examine Effect Gastric Bypass Surgery Venlafaxine ER Blood Levels
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Approved undergo RouxenY gastric bypass surgery ( cost surgery NOT include study ) Exclusion criterion : Pregnant Allergy venlafaxine desvenlafaxine Psychiatric hospitalization within prior 12 month Active professional treatment recent substance abuse within 12 month abstinence Ongoing psychologic issue , personality disorder , difficulty trauma survivor , difficulty depression unless stable , documented course treatment license mental health professional available Current use follow medications/supplements : 5hydroxytryptophan , almotriptan , amitriptyline , amoxapine , amoxicillinclavulanate , amphetaminedextroamphetamine , atazanavir , bupropion , cinacalcet , citalopram , clarithromycin , clomipramine , desipramine , desvenlafaxine , dextroamphetamine , dextromethorphan , doxepin , duloxetine , eletriptan , entacapone , escitalopram , fluoxetine , fluvoxamine , frovatriptan , haloperidol , imipramine , isocarboxazid , itraconazole , jujube seed extract , linezolid , maprotiline , methylene blue , metoclopramide , metoprolol , milnacipran , mirtazapine , naratriptan , nefazodone , nelfinavir , nortriptyline , paroxetine , phenelzine , procarbazine , protriptyline , quinidine , rasagiline , ritonavir , rizatriptan , saquinavir , selegiline , sertraline , St. John 's wort , sumatriptan , tapentadol , terbinafine , toremifene , tramadol , tranylcypromine , trazodone , trifluoperazine , trimipramine , tryptophan , Ltryptophan , venlafaxine , vilazodone , zolmitriptan
